channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Week 1: Past Elections and Gerrymandering
item.description: Welcome to my weekly election blog for the upcoming 2022 midterms in November. The goal of this blog is to create a prediction for both the seat share and the popular vote for each party within the House of Representatives. I will use this blog to explain changes and additions to my prediction model. I will also provide graphics that support my claims and data reasoning. This first post serves as an introduction to this upcoming election by analyzing the outcomes of past recent midterms.
